contents.item: Angelina leaned forward as Sara pulled Miki back to her, "You know what they say about curiosity? That it stabbed the annoying biker girl over and over and over again until she spit up blood.
The problem with having evil minions is that minions are stupid.
When I die, I want them to bury me facedown and ass up so that the whole world can kiss my ass!
Whatever you do, in the privacy of your own rain shower, is your own business
Home is where, when you go there and tell people to get out, they have to leave.
They said I was a valued customer, now they send me hate mail.
contents.owner: Sophie Kinsella, Confessions of a Shopaholic

contents.item: There were no windows in my bedroom, so I had to sit up and read my clock to figure out how angry I should be at my visitor. Eight A.M. I hated whoever woke me up. Had they come an hour earlier, I would have also hated their families and any household pets.
contents.owner: Lish McBride, Hold Me Closer, Necromancer

contents.item: Percy looked at his friends. “I’m getting tired of this guy’s shirt.
contents.owner: Rick Riordan, The Mark of Athena

contents.item: You look angry," he said."You put me on hold.""For a very good reason.""You put me," she said very, very slowly, "on hold.
contents.owner: Derek Landy, Kingdom of the Wicked

contents.item: I think I exist, therefore I exist. I think.
contents.owner: David Gerrold, The Man Who Folded Himself

contents.item: I Take Life Very Seriously: One Joke At A Time.
Show me a woman who doesn't feel guilty and I'll show you a man.
Brilliance is impossible without a touch of insanity.
Go slowly, so that you do not bite your tail by accident.
Fat men take a cushion with them wherever they go.
contents.owner: George R.R. Martin, A Feast for Crows
